data.actual_result: The "Listening Along" is still showing up and the Spotify status as well.
data.expected_result: The "Listening Along" bar would disappear and the Spotify green status.
data.short_description: The spotify "Listening Status" still shows up as well as the green status
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure to have Spotify Premium - Open Spotify & listen along with a friend or a user - Close Spotify
